works.title: chrome extension sp
works.description: I want to be productive as much as I can (and my friends too), that's why I developed a chrome extension to have a handy pomodoro timer to use when we need focus on our tasks. In the last recent version I added a timer tracker and some configuration stuff.

works.title: Frontend Mentor Challenge
works.description: Working on improve my frontend skill. A home/landing page for a design company.

works.title: This portfolio (old)
works.description: This portfolio (old fashioned) is itself a project! Crazy, right?
